forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Locally heavier rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Locally heavier rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and thunderstorms likely. Windy at times. Low 9C. WSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly late. Low 49F. WSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 59F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Cloudy skies will become mostly sunny in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NW at 40 to 55 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Cloudy skies will become mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NW at 25 to 35 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
